CustomField.description: Set duration field based on Status and difference between start and end times. Return the total number of minutes
CustomField.formula: IF ( DMAPP__Status__c == 'Completed', IF ( DMAPP__End_Time__c - DMAPP__Start_Time__c > 0, ROUND( (DMAPP__End_Time__c - DMAPP__Start_Time__c ) * 24 * 60, 0), 0 ), DMAPP__Scheduled_Duration__c )
CustomField.label: Review_Duration
